Life cycle of a star - Virtual Reality Animation

An animation showing the life cycle of a star. Everything from the interstellar space, Interstellar clouds, pressure waves, protostars and protoplanets, the Hydrostatic equilibrium and at last the collapse of a star Animated in virtual reality VR.
